comment._content: Elisabeth Marie's wikipedia page: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Archduchess_Elisabeth_Marie_of_Austria Stefanie's wikipedia page: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Princess_Stephanie_of_Windisch-Graetz

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: The Wikipedia page uses another (better) copy of the same image, from Vienna photographer, Hermann. Clemens. Kosel.  Kosel was photographer to the Austrian court.

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks to both of you for your research. We'll add some of the information to the record the next time we update.
